General.Name: Trufin PLC
General.Description: TruFin plc provides niche lending, early payment services, and video game publishing in the United Kingdom. It operates through four segments: Short Term Finance, Payment Services, Publishing, and Other. The company also engages in provision of distribution finance products, and invoice discounting; early payment programmes, payment control, and market insight services; publishing of video games; and investment activities. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1401 McKinney Street, Houston, TX, United States, 77010
